@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event object class for drag events

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Initialize the fields of the event. The event must be initialized before it can be dispatched.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
cancelable {Boolean?false} Whether or not an event can have its default
     action prevented. The default action can either be the browser's
     default action of a native event (e.g. open the context menu on a
     right click) or the default action of a qooxdoo class (e.g. close
     the window widget). The default action can be prevented by calling
     {@link qx.event.type.Event#preventDefault}
@param.description:
Whether or not an event can have its default
     action prevented. The default action can either be the browser's
     default action of a native event (e.g. open the context menu on a
     right click) or the default action of a qooxdoo class (e.g. close
     the window widget). The default action can be prevented by calling
     {@link qx.event.type.Event#preventDefault}

@param.name: @param
@param.body: originalEvent {qx.event.type.Track} The original (mouse) event to use

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the horizontal position at which the event occurred relative to the left of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The horizontal mouse position in the document.
@return.description: The horizontal mouse position in the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the vertical position at which the event occurred relative to the top of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The vertical mouse position in the document.
@return.description: The vertical mouse position in the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the drag&drop event handler responsible for the target

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Used during dragstart listener to inform the manager about supported data types.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} Data type to add to list of supported types
@param.description: Data type to add to list of supported types

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Used during dragstart listener to inform the manager about supported drop actions.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: action {String} Action to add to the list of supported actions
@param.description: Action to add to the list of supported actions

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the given type is supported by the drag target (source target). This is used in the event listeners for dragover or dragdrop.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} The type to look for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the given type is supported
@return.description: Whether the given type is supported

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the given action is supported by the drag target (source target). This is used in the event listeners for dragover or dragdrop.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: action {String} The action to look for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the given action is supported
@return.description: Whether the given action is supported

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds data of the given type to the internal storage. The data is available until the dragend event is fired.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the data of the given type. Used in the drop listener. Note that this is a synchronous method and if any of the drag and drop events handlers are implemented using Promises, this may fail; @see getDataAsync.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} Any of the supported types.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var} The data for the given type
@return.description: The data for the given type

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the data of the given type. Used in the drop listener.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} Any of the supported types.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.Promise|var} The data for the given type
@return.description: The data for the given type

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the type which was requested last, to be used in the droprequest listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the currently selected action. Depends on the supported actions of the source target and the modification keys pressed by the user. Used in the droprequest listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The action. May be one of move, copy or alias.
@return.description: The action. May be one of move, copy or alias.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the currently selected action. Depends on the supported actions of the source target and the modification keys pressed by the user. Used in the droprequest listener.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.Promise|String} The action. May be one of move, copy or alias.
@return.description: The action. May be one of move, copy or alias.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the current drop target allows the current drag target. This can be called from within the "drag" event to enable/disable a drop target selectively, for example based on the child item, above and beyond the one-time choice made by the the "dragover" event for the droppable widget itself.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: isAllowed {Boolean} False if a drop should be disallowed
@param.description: False if a drop should be disallowed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the target which has been initially tapped on.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Stops the drag&drop session and fires a dragend event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
